plot: Season 7 finale. As LaGuerta closes in on Dexter's secret, Dexter struggles to protect himself, Debra and the life he's built.

As the new year approaches, Dexter visits Hannah McKay in jail, confirming his affection for her. Because she is unable to understand why he turned her in, he explains that he could never be certain that she will not again attempt to harm Debra Morgan, his sister, whose safety he will always consider paramount. The following day with the help of a friend, Hannah manages to escape custody and goes into hiding. Capt. Maria LaGuerta has Dexter arrested. Dexter is released, but he and Debra know that LaGuerta is closing in on them and that they need to find a way out. Dexter remembers how Sgt. Doakes first became suspicious of him, setting his current predicament in motion.—Harry Tumilson
